# Change Log

## 1.2.0

1. Add a new `usePackageJson` option to enable locally installed standard only.

2. Update deps

## 1.1.7

1. Fix doc
2. Update icon

1. Fix vue doc

## 1.1.3

1. Add semistandard option, thanks to kutyel

## 1.1.2

1. Fix typo

## 1.1.1

1. Warn user the reason when StandardJS failed to lint

## 1.0.9

1. Update from upstream.
